topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Carrier Grade (Beta): Installation Overview

titlealts.searchtitle: HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Carrier Grade (Beta): Installation Overivew

body.p: This document describes the installation process for HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Carrier Grade in a baremetal environment.

section.title: About the installation
section.p: The HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Carrier Grade installation installs HPE Helion Lifecycle Management, creates a base HPE Helion OpenStack(R) cloud, and configures network virtualization through HPE Distributed Cloud Networking. Using a separate installation, you integrate Wind River Linux servers into the HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Carrier Grade environment.
After installation, you can interact with the HPE Helion OpenStack(R) cloud using the Horizon graphical interface or using the CLIs of the respective services.
